newsitem.title: UK: Saudi Aramco ups Oct term crude to U.S. 15-30 cts.
newsitem.headline: Saudi Aramco ups Oct term crude to U.S. 15-30 cts.

text.p: Saudi Aramco raised its October crude prices for term lifters in the United States by 15-30 cents a barrel, traders said.
The biggest rises of 30 and 25 cents were on Berri Extra Light and Arab Light respectively. Arab Heavy went up 15 cents and Arab Medium by 20 cents.
This raises Berri Extra Light to WSTI -$2.20 from WTI -$2.50 in September and Arab Light to WTI -$3.00 from WTI -$3.25.
Arab Medium rose to WTI -$3.85 from WTI -$4.05 and Arab Heavy to WTI -$4.40 from WTI -$4.55.
